original_text: And should I not have concern for the great city of Nineveh, in which there are more than a hundred and twenty thousand people who cannot tell their right hand from their left—and also many animals?”
korean_text: 하물며 이 큰 성읍 니느웨에는 좌우를 분변하지 못하는 자가 십이만여 명이요 가축도 많이 있나니 내가 어찌 아끼지 아니하겠느냐 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And should I not have concern
for the great city of Nineveh
in which there are more than
a hundred and twenty thousand people
who cannot tell their right hand

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또한 많은 동물들도 있지 않겠는가
